mapper.select: SELECT CODE_NAME AS LAWCLASSNAME FROM PD_LAW.CMM_CODE_DETAIL WHERE CLASS_CODE='LCN' ORDER BY CODE_NAME

SELECT LAWID, SUBKEY, SHOWDATE, SHOWNO, MAINTEXT,
(RANK()OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBKEY))) RNUM FROM T_LAWSUBTEXT WHERE LAWID = #{searchKeyword}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LAWID, ARTICLEKEY, ARTICLENO, NAME, ACTDATE, BEFOREMOVE, AFTERMOVE, ISMODIFY, MAINTEXT,
(RANK()OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(ARTICLEKEY))) RNUM FROM T_LAWARTICLE WHERE LAWID = #{searchKeyword} ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex}+1 AND #{lastIndex}

SELECT LAWID, ARTICLEKEY, ITEMNO, HIGHERITEMNO, CATE, LPAD(' ',2*(LEVEL-1))||ITEMTEXT AS ITEMTEXT FROM ( SELECT LAWID, ARTICLEKEY, ITEMNO, HIGHERITEMNO, CATE, ITEMTEXT FROM T_LAWITEM WHERE LAWID = #{lawId} AND ARTICLEKEY = #{articleKey} ) START WITH HIGHERITEMNO IS NULL OR HIGHERITEMNO = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMNO = HIGHERITEMNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY ITEMNO

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(ARTICLEKEY) FROM T_LAWARTICLE WHERE LAWID = #{lawId}) AS JOCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(CATE) FROM T_LAWITEM WHERE LAWID = #{lawId} AND CATE = 'PARA') AS HANGCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(CATE) FROM T_LAWITEM WHERE LAWID = #{lawId} AND CATE = 'SUBP') AS HOCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(CATE) FROM T_LAWITEM WHERE LAWID = #{lawId} AND CATE = 'ITEM') AS MOKCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(SUBKEY) FROM T_LAWSUBTEXT WHERE LAWID = #{lawId}) AS SUBCOUNT
FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE T_LAWLIST SET LAWNO = #{lawNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOWHISTORYCODE = #{nowHistoryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAWNAME = #{lawName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATENO = #{createNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISMODIFY = #{isModify, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAREDEPT = #{careDept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAWCLASSNAME = #{lawClassName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTDATE = #{actDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSELF = #{isSelf, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAILLINK = #{detailLink, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE LAWID = #{lawId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_LAWLIST (LAWID, LAWNO, NOWHISTORYCODE, LAWNAME, CREATEDATE, CREATENO, ISMODIFY, CAREDEPT, LAWCLASSNAME, ACTDATE, ISSELF, DETAILLINK) VALUES (#{lawId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lawNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nowHistoryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lawName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isModify, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careDept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lawClassName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSelf, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailLink, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
